<MethodEndpoint

  context={"endpoint"}
>

Saves the mail domain settings specified in the request to the portal.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"oneOf":[{"enum":["None","Custom","All"],"type":"string","description":"[None - None, Custom - Custom, All - All]","example":"None"},{"enum":[0,1,2],"type":"integer","description":"[0 - None, 1 - Custom, 2 - All]","example":0}],"title":"ASC.Core.Tenants.TenantTrustedDomainsType"},"domains":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"List of trusted domains","nullable":true,"example":["some text"]},"inviteUsersAsVisitors":{"type":"boolean","description":"Invites as a user or not","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"Request parameters for mail domain settings","title":"ASC.Web.Api.ApiModel.RequestsDto.MailDomainSettingsRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
